_source.text: 1.) No enchanted weapons or armour, no fists 2.) No diamond armour 3.) Vampires can not have any better armour than gold (Because vampires have a fighting advantage) 4.) No leaving the arena, or walking up on the wall next to the fences 5.) Vampires are not allowed to use bones to fly.

_source.text: A baby's born in the middle of the night in a local delivery room They grab his feet smack him till he cries he goes home the next day afternoon Before you know he's off to school and he graduates in May Goes out and gets a PhD and then cures all sorts of things Wins a Nobel Prize and saves a million different lives The world a better place for all he's done It's funny when think about the reason he's alive Is all because two people fell in love

_source.text: A few things to google and consider: A wedge (much better angle than blocks) or even tucker sling Cranial osteopathy A&e if your baby just won't stop crying to ask for the next level up of medication Keeping your baby upright all the time Not using a bumbo because of the pressure on their stomach Staying away from any waist bands Putting to sleep on stomach under docs guidance Thickening feed with carobel A sling Swaddling when feeding when in the middle of a flare up
